dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here's a summary of your mystical business.

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.description: Manage all your client bookings here.

schedule.title: Schedule a New Appointment
schedule.step1_desc: Select the client for this appointment.
schedule.step2_desc: Choose the services for this session.
schedule.step3_desc: Pick a date and time for the appointment.
schedule.summary_desc: Review the details before confirming the appointment.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: View and manage your client roster.

add.title: Add New Customer
add.description: Enter the details for the new customer.
add.success_toast_desc: New customer has been successfully added.
add.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.

reading.title: New Tarot Reading
reading.description: Perform a new tarot reading for a client.
reading.spreadDescription: The cards representing past, present, and future.
reading.loadingMessage: The spirits are whispering... Please wait.

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: The connection to the ethereal plane was lost. Please try again.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: Explore the mystical services we offer.

specializations.title: Service Offerings
specializations.description: Manage the types of readings you provide.

durations.title: Session Durations & Pricing
durations.description: Set the available durations and their corresponding prices.

payment.title: Payment Gateways
payment.description: Configure how you accept payments from clients.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: View and manage your public tarot reader profile.
